description: After graduating from college and struggling to find work, Elise Graves finds herself in the kinky world of BDSM fantasies when she takes a job at Madam Rain's brothel. "The Professor" and "Doctor Davis" are two separate clients who she encounters on her first day as a sex worker. Elise fulfills their fantasies with role play, hard punishment, bondage, anal and rough sex!
title: The Brothel
